attributes.title: 2012: The Truth As It Is by Nithyananda
attributes.description:
2012 - everyone has spoken about it, NASA, philosophers, psychologists, scientists, gurus, everyone. Is it the end of the world? Is it the doomsday? Is it the armageddon? Why does the Mayan calendar end in 2012? What is the truth? What is the prophecy?

Or is it shift in consciousness... which only enlightened civilizations and masters have deeply understood? Is it the time which marks the beginning of enlightened humanity?

Coming straight from the experience of enlightenment, Paramahamsa Nithyananda, a rare living enlightened master, unravels the truth of 2012, as it is. This video is a trailer to upcoming detailed video where the master opens up 2012 as the beginning of construction and rejuvenation of human consciousness.

Sign up now at www.dhyanapeetam.org/2012 for the exclusive first rights to the detailed video on "2012 - The Truth As It Is" by Paramahamsa Nithyananda.
